articles.title: Environmental Advocacy
articles.contents:
Sunrise Movement
Sunrise Santa Barbara
Sunrise Bay Area
Sunrise Bay Radio
From April 2020 to June 2021, I co-lead the development and creation of a podcast for the Bay Area Hub of the Sunrise Movement, called Sunrise Bay Radio. Every month, we explored the intersection of the climate crisis with every aspect of our society, from the COVID-19 pandemic to racial justice. Check it out at anchor.fm/sunrisebayradio.
Fossil Fuel Divestment

articles.title: Research
articles.description: Ecological and social implications of marine resource management under climate change
articles.contents:
Current Projects
MPA Design
How do we best study MPAs for climate resilience?
Past Projects
Blue Whales & Navy Sonar
While completing my undergraduate degree at UC San Diego, I worked in the Marine Bioacoustics Lab at Scripps Institution of Oceanography. There I studied blue whale acoustic behavior and looked at the impact of climate change and Navy sonar on blue whale foraging calls.
Variation in Hymenoptera species richness by land use
Effect of neonicotinoid pesticides on honey bee learning and locomotion
